name: SyphilisTestsForTreponemaPallidumNucleicAcid
title: Syphilis (Tests for Treponema pallidum Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Treponema pallidum Nucleic Acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Treponema pallidum DNA, PolA gene),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
